docs.snippet: Cyber crime is probably the biggest risk facing companies across the world, and they need to do more to help governments tackle the problem, U.S. Deputy Treasury Secretary Sarah Bloom Raskin said on Wednesday....

docs.snippet: The troubled city of Flint says its supply is safe despite the development of odors and discoloration since a switch from Lake Huron to the Flint River....
docs.lead_paragraph: The troubled city of Flint says its supply is safe despite the development of odors and discoloration since a switch from Lake Huron to the Flint River.
docs.abstract: Residents of Flint, Mich, have begun complaining that city water from taps smells and looks odd and that they suspect it is unsafe; residents say problems began after city, in effort to save money, stopped buying water from Detroit and began drawing water from Flint River and treating it locally; city officials claim that water is safe.

headline.main: A Water Dilemma in Michigan: Cloudy or Costly?
headline.print_headline: A Water Dilemma in Flint: Cloudy or Costly?

docs.snippet: A Northern California woman and her boyfriend concocted her reported abduction that spurred a two-day search, police said late Wednesday. The revelation came just hours after she had reappeared 400 miles away in Southern California to the emotiona...
docs.lead_paragraph: A Northern California woman and her boyfriend concocted her reported abduction that spurred a two-day search, police said late Wednesday. The revelation came just hours after she had reappeared 400 miles away in Southern California to the emotional relief of her family.

headline.main: Police: No Evidence of Kidnapping of California Woman
headline.print_headline: Police: No Evidence of Kidnapping of California Woman
